inklingMod:SwimmingPower.NAME: Swimming
DESCRIPTIONS: Can't attack, gain #b1 [E] after playing a card. Lasts until your next turn.

inklingMod:InkPower.NAME: Ink
DESCRIPTIONS: more damage from #yAttacks. Each turn, reduces by 50%.

inklingMod:SplattershotJrPower.NAME: Splattershot Jr.
DESCRIPTIONS: Add 2 #yJunior #yShots to your hand each turn.

inklingMod:SplattershotJrPlusPower.NAME: Splattershot Jr.+
DESCRIPTIONS: Add 2 #yJunior #yShots+ to your hand each turn.

inklingMod:RarePower.NAME: Placeholder Power
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of your turn, TOUCH #b
